text: â›” Portions of Francis and Greenwood roads will be closed temporarily beginning today through March for a sewer extension project. The closures will occur in phases and be in effect between 8:45 a.m. to 4 p.m. https://t.co/n1dADIvV3y

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: In phase two, the intersection of Francis and Greenwood will close during construction hours beginning in early March for approximately five days. A detour will use Greenwood, Woodman Road and Mountain.

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text:
In phase three, Greenwood will close during construction hours beginning in mid-March for approximately 15 days. A detour will use Greenwood, Woodman and Mountain.

We will update on social media when the work is transitioning to the next phases.

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: Public Works will host a public information meeting Thursday, March 5 from 5:30 to 8:30 p.m. at Varina High School (7053 Messer Road) to discuss its ongoing study on the Route 5 and New Osborne Turnpike corridors in eastern Henrico. https://t.co/fqQVkU0z1n

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text:
The study will evaluate potential safety and traffic improvements along the corridors. This is the second public meeting in the process. Our engineers will present multiple traffic improvement concepts for public feedback and input.

We'd love to see you there!

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: For more information on the study, visit https://t.co/iqbJM0yrPK

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: Feb. 18 is National Battery Day! ðŸ”‹We thought this might be a perfect time to discuss our nemesis: Lithium-ion batteries. https://t.co/dUDhyhOeOC

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: Lithium-ion batteries cannot be recycled in your household recycling. They must be taken to a proper disposal site, which are easy to find through The Battery Network program. Find a location near you by visiting https://t.co/DDD4OyCS0L

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: Learn more about the different types of batteries and their proper disposal at https://t.co/Ve0U91qgKx.

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: ðŸš§ Kain Road will close between Willane and North Gayton roads beginning Monday, Feb. 16 for a sewer installation. A detour will use Willane, Heather Grove, Stone Horse, Perrywinkle, Pouncey Tract and North Gayton roads. The work is take one week, depending on weather. https://t.co/sWoKrybN95

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: ðŸš§ Audubon Drive will close between South Airport Drive and Oakleys Lane beginning Tuesday, Feb. 17 for a sewer repair. A detour will use Oakleys, Williamsburg Road and South Airport. The work is expected to take two weeks, depending on weather.

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text:

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: Sadler Road between Sadler Grove Road and Sadler Green Lane will close Monday, Feb. 9 for utility work, roundabout construction and realignment of the roadway. This work is part of the Sadler Road Realignment and Improvements project. https://t.co/0JrhBtqebM

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text:
A detour will use Sadler Green Lane, Sadler Glen Lane, Sadler Glen Place, Greenbrooke Drive, Brookmere Drive, Oscar Place, Jalbert Drive, Dublin Road and Sadler Walk Lane.

The work is expected to take several months to complete.

author.name: Henrico County Public Works & Public Utilities

text: For more information on the project, visit https://t.co/FPDkw7fNlY
